self-assessment.translation[0].definitio: when you judge your own work or progress
when someone who works for themselves calculates how much tax they should pay
self-assessment.translation[1].definitio: a tax system in which people present information on how much they have earned and calculate for themselves how much tax they have to pay in a particular year
For self-assessment to work, the tax has to be simple enough for taxpayers to be able to fill in their own tax returns.
